title: 8 healing practices that can boost your wellbeing - Natural Health
author: Natural Health editorial team
description: You're probably up to speed with Ayurveda and traditional Chinese medicine but what about aboriginal bush medicine or unanitibb? We take a look at popular healing rituals across the globe
